job_details.Functieomschrijving:
We are looking for an ambitious and skilled Senior Go Engineer to play a key role in the development and delivery of our software products and apps serving over 4m+ users across the globe., As a member of our tech team in Amsterdam, and together with fellow developers, engineers, designers, and product managers, you will contribute to the development of innovative solutions that cater to the requirements of our expanding user community. This empowers users to maximize the benefits derived from our products and services. Additionally, you will have the responsibility of designing and implementing systems that interact with our continuously evolving AI-powered platform, ensuring that what you deliver is scalable, reliable, and secure.
     * Write production-grade product and platform code.
     * Work with a strong agile mindset. Iterate fast and make data-driven decisions.
     * Take responsibility for component technical designs and deliver quality code.
     * Promote feedback and knowledge sharing culture.

   Projects you can look forward to:
     * CF Spark. Our very own Generative AI tool for which customers have already generated over 40+ million images in the last couple of months
     * Launch our Mobile Apps for both iOS and Android platforms.
     * Develop our Community Tools. Kicking this off with our very own AI Chatbot.

   And to have a glimpse of some of the amazing stuff we do on the tech side, here is a fresh piece by An Tran, our Head of Engineering about how Creative Fabrica is supporting creators with Generative AI.
job_details.full_text:
Go Engineer

We are looking for an ambitious and skilled Senior Go Engineer to play a key role in the development and delivery of our software products and apps serving over 4m+ users across the globe., As a member of our tech team in Amsterdam, and together with fellow developers, engineers, designers, and product managers, you will contribute to the development of innovative solutions that cater to the requirements of our expanding user community. This empowers users to maximize the benefits derived from our products and services. Additionally, you will have the responsibility of designing and implementing systems that interact with our continuously evolving AI-powered platform, ensuring that what you deliver is scalable, reliable, and secure.
     * Write production-grade product and platform code.
     * Work with a strong agile mindset. Iterate fast and make data-driven decisions.
     * Take responsibility for component technical designs and deliver quality code.
     * Promote feedback and knowledge sharing culture.

   Projects you can look forward to:
     * CF Spark. Our very own Generative AI tool for which customers have already generated over 40+ million images in the last couple of months
     * Launch our Mobile Apps for both iOS and Android platforms.
     * Develop our Community Tools. Kicking this off with our very own AI Chatbot.

   And to have a glimpse of some of the amazing stuff we do on the tech side, here is a fresh piece by An Tran, our Head of Engineering about how Creative Fabrica is supporting creators with Generative AI.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on Go engineering and traditional software development tasks. While it mentions interacting with an 'AI-powered platform' and a 'Generative AI tool' (CF Spark), the core responsibilities and projects described are centered around building and launching software products (Mobile Apps, Community Tools, Chatbot) using Go. There is no indication of deep involvement in developing, fine-tuning, or deploying AI models themselves, which are the hallmarks of a GenAI Engineer or ML Engineer. The role appears to be primarily a backend/software engineering position that *integrates* with AI systems rather than *develops* them.

job_tasks.justification: The job description explicitly states 'Write production-grade product and platform code', 'Take responsibility for component technical designs and deliver quality code', and mentions launching Mobile Apps and developing Community Tools, all of which are core software development activities.
job_tasks.phrase: Write production-grade product and platform code

job_tasks.justification: The role involves designing and implementing systems that interact with an AI platform, and building user-facing applications like a chatbot, which falls under software development.
job_tasks.phrase: designing and implementing systems that interact with our continuously evolving AI-powered platform

job_tasks.justification: Launching mobile apps for iOS and Android is a clear software development responsibility.
job_tasks.phrase: Launch our Mobile Apps for both iOS and Android platforms

job_tasks.justification: Developing community tools, specifically mentioning an AI Chatbot, involves building software applications that leverage AI, but the focus is on the development of the tool itself.
job_tasks.phrase: Develop our Community Tools. Kicking this off with our very own AI Chatbot

job_tasks.justification: The description mentions serving 'over 4m+ users across the globe' and catering to the 'requirements of our expanding user community', indicating an understanding of business context and user needs.
job_tasks.phrase: serving over 4m+ users across the globe

job_tasks.justification: The role involves contributing to 'innovative solutions that cater to the requirements of our expanding user community', aligning technical work with user needs and business goals.
job_tasks.phrase: contribute to the development of innovative solutions that cater to the requirements of our expanding user community

job_tasks.justification: The requirement to ensure delivered systems are 'scalable, reliable, and secure' touches upon operational aspects of software deployment and maintenance.
job_tasks.phrase: ensuring that what you deliver is scalable, reliable, and secure

job_tasks.justification: The mention of 'Work with a strong agile mindset. Iterate fast and make data-driven decisions' points to a pragmatic and iterative approach to problem-solving.
job_tasks.phrase: Work with a strong agile mindset. Iterate fast and make data-driven decisions.

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Promote feedback and knowledge sharing culture' directly relates to communication and collaboration within the team.
job_tasks.phrase: Promote feedback and knowledge sharing culture

soft_skills.phrase: Promote feedback and knowledge sharing culture
Work with a strong agile mindset. Iterate fast and make data-driven decisions.
Take responsibility for component technical designs and deliver quality code.
